title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 260.1 - Notices to be published in the State Register
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 260.1 - Notices to be published in the State Register

State Regulations

The notices to be published in the State Register in relation
to rule making actions under the provisions of the State Administrative

Procedure Act, notices required by other statute and any other types of notices
published at the discretion of the Secretary of State include, but are not
limited to, the following: (a) Notice
of Proposed Rule Making; (b) Notice
of Revised Rule Making; (c) Notice
of Adoption; (d) Amended Notice of

Adoption; (e) Notice of

Withdrawal; (f) Notice of Emergency

Adoption. This notice must be submitted when a proposal is not being submitted
simultaneously with the emergency adoption; (g) Notice of Emergency Adoption and Proposed

Rule Making. This notice must be submitted to simultaneously publish a Notice
of Proposed Rule Making and file an emergency adoption; (h) Notice of Emergency Adoption and Revised

Rule Making. This notice must be submitted when it is the intent to make
substantial revisions to a rule that was previously proposed and file an
emergency adoption simultaneously; (i) Guidance Document

Certification; (j) Notice of

Expiration; (k) Regulatory

Agenda; (l) Notice of Public

Hearing; (m) Public Notice; and
(n) Notice of Availability of

State and Federal Funds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
260.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
